CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Meanwhile , with an increase of the length of the alkyl side chains , the d 2 -spacing of PffBB-n polymers showed a descending trend of 3.84 , 3.82 , 3.77 , and 3.66 Å for PffBB-10 , PffBB-12 , PffBB-14 , and PffBB-16 , respectively , which indicated that PffBB-n with longer alkyl side chains exhibited enhanced ordered molecular packing.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-10 |
| PffBB-12 |
| PffBB-14 |
| PffBB-16 |

Explanation:

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are "PffBB-10", "PffBB-12", "PffBB-14", and "PffBB-16". These are the names of the polymers being discussed in the paragraph. They are mentioned as the objects of study and are therefore the material names.

| PffBB-16 |

Explanation:

The only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to "Material Name" are "PffBB-10", "PffBB-12", "PffBB-14", and "PffBB-16". These are the names of the polymers being discussed in the paragraph. They are mentioned as the objects of study and are therefore the material names.

The other entities in the paragraph, such as "alkyl side chains", "d 2 -spacing", and "Å" do not refer to material names and are therefore not included in the table.
